title: Bug 18268: Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description:
Bug 18268: Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories

Build 200205291235

Setup:
1. Start eclipse.
2. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif
3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini
   - Change the value of the aboutImage property: aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif
4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini
   - Change the value of the aboutImage property: aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the about dialog

Observed Behavior:
- There is a main image again.

Expected Behavior:
- The main image should be displayed correctly.

Additional Steps to Reproduce:
1. Exit eclipse.
2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif
   - Move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif
3. Start eclipse again.
